languages.text: {n}Серый Вортен, кожа которого и впрямь испещрена серыми пятнами, бросает преданный взгляд на Каллигоса. Он и впрямь похож на животное — кровожадное и неразумное.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Серый Вортен, кожа которого и впрямь испещрена серыми пятнами, бросает преданный взгляд на Каллигоса. Он и впрямь похож на животное — кровожадное и неразумное.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Worten the Grey, whose skin really is dotted with grey spots, looks at Calligos with purest devotion. Indeed, he is akin to an animal — one that is bloodthirsty and mindless.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Серый Вортен, кожа которого и впрямь испещрена серыми пятнами, бросает преданный взгляд на Каллигоса. Он и впрямь похож на животное — кровожадное и неразумное.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Worten the Gray, whose skin really is dotted with gray spots, glances at Calligos with loyalty. Indeed, he is akin to an animal — one that is bloodthirsty and mindless.{/n}
{n}Worten the Gray, whose skin really is dotted with gray spots, glances at Calligos with loyalty. Indeed, he is akin to an animal — one that is bloodthirsty and mindless.{/n}

{n}Worten the Grey, whose skin really is dotted with grey spots, looks at Calligos with purest devotion. Indeed, he is akin to an animal — one that is bloodthirsty and mindless.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ヴォルテン・ザ・グレイは灰色のしみが散らばった肌を持ち、極めて純粋な献身に満ちた目でカリゴスを見つめる。事実、ヴォルテンは獣、血に飢えた心ない獣と同類だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worten the Grey, whose skin really is dotted with grey spots, looks at Calligos with purest devotion. Indeed, he is akin to an animal — one that is bloodthirsty and mindless.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォルテン・ザ・グレイは灰色のしみが散らばった肌を持ち、極めて純粋な献身に満ちた目でカリゴスを見つめる。事実、ヴォルテンは獣、血に飢えた心ない獣と同類だ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}灰斑沃尔腾人如其名，皮肤上布满了灰色的斑点，他望向卡里戈斯的目光里只有纯粹的忠诚。他确实像头野兽，残忍嗜血，头脑空空。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worten the Grey, whose skin really is dotted with grey spots, looks at Calligos with purest devotion. Indeed, he is akin to an animal — one that is bloodthirsty and mindless.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}灰斑沃尔腾人如其名，皮肤上布满了灰色的斑点，他望向卡里戈斯的目光里只有纯粹的忠诚。他确实像头野兽，残忍嗜血，头脑空空。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Worten el Gris, cuya piel está marcada con motas grises, mira a Calligos con adoración pura. En efecto, es muy parecido a un animal sanguinario y descerebrado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worten the Grey, whose skin really is dotted with grey spots, looks at Calligos with purest devotion. Indeed, he is akin to an animal — one that is bloodthirsty and mindless.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Worten el Gris, cuya piel está marcada con motas grises, mira a Calligos con adoración pura. En efecto, es muy parecido a un animal sanguinario y descerebrado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Worten le Gris, qui tire probablement son nom des taches grisâtres qui lui constellent la peau, fixe Calligos avec une dévotion proche du fanatisme. Il est en effet semblable à un animal... un animal sans cervelle et assoiffé de sang.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worten the Grey, whose skin really is dotted with grey spots, looks at Calligos with purest devotion. Indeed, he is akin to an animal — one that is bloodthirsty and mindless.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Worten le Gris, qui tire probablement son nom des taches grisâtres qui lui constellent la peau, fixe Calligos avec une dévotion proche du fanatisme. Il est en effet semblable à un animal... un animal sans cervelle et assoiffé de sang.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Worten der Graue, dessen Haut tatsächlich voller grauer Punkte ist, blickt Calligos voller Hingabe an. Er ähnelt wirklich einem Tier – einem blutrünstigen und hirnlosen Tier.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worten the Grey, whose skin really is dotted with grey spots, looks at Calligos with purest devotion. Indeed, he is akin to an animal — one that is bloodthirsty and mindless.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Worten der Graue, dessen Haut tatsächlich voller grauer Punkte ist, blickt Calligos voller Hingabe an. Er ähnelt wirklich einem Tier – einem blutrünstigen und hirnlosen Tier.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cildi hakikaten gri lekelerle dolu olan Gri Worten, saf bir bağlılıkla Calligos'a bakıyor. Gerçekten de kana susamış ve akılsız bir hayvana benziyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worten the Grey, whose skin really is dotted with grey spots, looks at Calligos with purest devotion. Indeed, he is akin to an animal — one that is bloodthirsty and mindless.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cildi hakikaten gri lekelerle dolu olan Gri Worten, Calligos'a bağlılığın en safıyla bakıyor. Gerçekten de kana susamış ve akılsız bir hayvana benziyor.{/n}
